typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TEMPB as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MARA
MARA derive(StorageConditionId = concat ( 'a_' , toString ( currentTimestamp ( ) ) ),
		ItemSku = toInteger ( concat ( 'a_' , toString ( currentTimestamp ( ) ) ) )) ~> ExpItemStorageCondition
ExpItemStorageCondition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ItemSku,
		StorageConditionId,
		ItemStorageConditionNote = TEMPB
	)) ~> ItemStorageCondition
